text: Sounds great. It’s really good that you know your focus already. It can take people a long time to figure that out. Would love to see any work that you have.
I’m not in art per se, but I did start as a 2d animator back in the day, and have worked as a concept artist at one point
Recently I’ve worked as a visualization supervisor, which tends to cover previs, postvis, techvis and virtual production
Prior to that, I’ve also worked as an animator and made quite a few films in animation and live action
Let me know if you don’t know what any of those things are and I can explain!
What is your ideal place of work?

I have always been interested in making characters/creatures and recently I have found myself really going into the design and shape theories, so that would be my ideal place to work. The thing that got me into that was ILM's art department as I attended their presentation and they were going through their work on Jurassic world and how they designed the park to be like Piccadilly Square with all it adverts and such.

I do know about previs it was one of my modules in uni and I really enjoyed it to be honest. I have heard about postvis but don't know what that is and certainly have no idea about techvis. As a starting job I wouldn't mind working in previs but my end goal is still concept design/art director.
